VOTE_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to Vote for Sofi on Top.GG. Every Vote you contribute to Sofi will reward you with 1 Wist on a weekday and 2 Wists on a weekend.
USE_WIST: You will obtain a **Wist** <:wist:870339503427027005> for each successful **Vote**!
EMBED_FOOTER: You get double the amount of Wists on a weekend
